page.title: 13CHURCHES IN BRIGG
page.content:
The three churches in Brigg are The Methodist Church, Saint John's Church of England and Saint Mary's Roman Catholic Church. {The Methodist Church}is the main
church of the Brigg Methodist circuit of fifteen churches. {Minister:} The Rev. Horace Boyer {Membership:} 89 people The{Community Roll:} 235 {Societies:} {Sunday School:} 4O members meet at ll.OO am on Sunday {Girls Brigade}(interdenominational): 30 members meet on Monday {Womens' Fellowship:} l5 members meet on Tuesday afternoons {Wednesday Group}(ladies) 29 members meet on Wednesday evening {Youth Club:} l5 members meet on Sunday evenings
